description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the 'Locations & Time Slots' management screen used by managers. It includes layout and UI elements, access control based on permissions, and placeholders for future content related to pickup points, locations, and time slots.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: Stateless widget representing the locations and time slots management screen for a manager, with access control and UI layout.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget displaying a styled header section with an icon and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget representing a reusable styled row with an icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the main screen, including permission check and UI layout.

methods.name: _SectionHeader.build
methods.description: Builds the header widget with styled background, icon, and title.

methods.name: _Row.build
methods.description: Builds a styled row with an icon and text label.
